General.Name: UCrest Bhd
General.Description: UCrest Berhad, an investment holding company, designs, develops, and markets information technology related products and services. The company offers i-Medic cloud hospital that is used by doctors and patients for the diagnosis, management, and treatment of chronic diseases, such as cardiovascular diseases, cancer, diabetes, hypertension, sleep apnea, stroke rehabilitation, and other diseases in the United States, China, Singapore, Malaysia, Taiwan, Indonesia, Russia, and the Middle East countries. It also provides mobile healthcare services. The company was formerly known as Palette Multimedia Berhad and changed its name to UCrest Berhad in November 2017. UCrest Berhad was founded in 1997 and is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
